class SXF_ElemCollimatorHash : public SXF_ElemBucketHash

Interface

SXF_ElemCollimatorHash()

Description

The ElemCollimatorHash class implements a collimator bucket hash. SXF Collimator attribute keys are "xsize" and "ysize".

Member Description

SXF_ElemCollimatorHash()

virtual int index(const char* name) const

Map an attribute key to its enum value. Return a corresponding enum value or -1.
